definitions.definition: To take revenge for (a particular harmful action ) or on behalf of (its victim ); to avenge .
examples: Arsenal revenged their loss to Manchester United last time with a 5–0 drubbing this time.

definitions.definition: To take one's revenge ( on or upon someone).
To take vengeance ; to revenge itself.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To take revenge for (a particular harmful action ) or on behalf of (its victim ); to avenge .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , reflexive ) To take one's revenge ( on or upon someone).
( intransitive , archaic ) To take vengeance ; to revenge itself.
